name: Long Neckie Vibes on the Go by Nyla Hayes

metadata.name: Calming Refresh by Nyla Hayes
metadata.description:
This is 'Calming Refresh', the first of two digital editions that make up Long Neckie Vibes on the Go by Nyla Hayes.


Calming Refresh was designed to bring holders the calming and refreshing room vibes of blue mood lighting. 

Nyla Hayes is a 14 year of digital artist who loves encouraging and motivating everyone to chase their dreams. She is the creator of the Long Neckie brand and NFT Children's Day. Web3 has enabled her to build a loving and supportive community that has elevated her in ways she never imagined. At the age of 12 she was named TIMEPIECES 1st Artist in residence and emerging artist of the year. Other accolades include, Cadillac's Rising Icon, Ebony Power 100, Black Enterprise 40 under 40, 2x Future 50 & Culture shifter award winner.

Long Neckie Vibes on the Go by Nyla Hayes is part of the Audio Galleries Series of Artist Editions.

'Calming Refresh' is available as an open edition for all to mint from the 6th till the 9th April 2023. Following this, 'Creative Passion' will be airdropped to those that mint 'Calming Refresh' and also hold an Audio Galleries Mint Pass. This will happen following a snapshot to be taken on the 10th April 2023 at 2pm GMT.
